meta_description: Converts .crx files (Chrome extensions) to .xpi (Firefox extensions). Copy/Paste a Chrome Web Store URL and click "Download".
title_description: Makes Chrome extensions compatible with Firefox
index_intro1: Makes Chrome extensions compatible with Firefox
index_intro2: Copy/Paste a Chrome Web Store extension URL below:
converter_placeholder: Copy/Paste Chrome Web Store URL here...
footer_warning:
WARNING !
Some extensions may be broken after the conversion as Firefox doesn't support all features available on Chrome. These extensions may work partially or be totally corrupted.
